lines.Vitus: "Well, there goes our chance for a relaxing evening."

lines: (Unfortunately, the cheetah locks his gaze with us.)
(We shield our eyes when he rises from the water and goes for his towel.)
(Then he walks up to us with the usual swagger in his step.)

lines.Zermes: "I saw that the both of you were about to approach me, so I decided to do so first."
"Pity that your friend is so easily scandalised."

lines.Vitus: "...You're not exactly the best judge of such things."

lines.Zermes: "A little bit of nudity? Shameless?"
"I see that I still have so much to teach you two."

lines.Vitus: "Volesus is the better pupil, but you've scared him away. "

lines.Zermes: "Silly kitten."

lines.Vitus: "You still think that all the things I do are frivolous, don't you?"

lines.Zermes: "You don't say it with your words."
"You say it with your tone, your posture, your facial expression."
"There's not a shy trace of mystery to you.
"What I see on the surface is what I get."

lines.Vitus: "I won't forget how you handled the agricultural union.

lines.Zermes: "Of course you won't."
"It disgusts you too much."
"You'd prefer for your options to be nice and ethical, right?"

lines.Vitus: "I think living with ethical standards is important, yes."

lines.Zermes: "Granted that you have the luxury to choose."

lines.Vitus: "There's always a choice for any action we take."

lines.Zermes: "That's certainly true if dying is on the table."
"But trust me. Nobody has a lovely corpse."
"I don't care how cute you are.
"Pits of the underworld..."
"We should work on your lying skills, too."
"That was embarrassing."
"Now now, I'm not that petty. "
"I won't lord that little slip-up over you."

lines.Vitus: "But isn't that exactly what you're doing right now?"

lines.Zermes: "My, my! There may be some hope for you yet."

lines.Vitus: "I don't care how charming you are."
"You're not going to wrap me around your finger like the rest of the people you manipulate."

lines.Zermes: "Well, of course not. You're my master"
"You'd have to command me to wrap you around my finger if you wanted it that badly."
"That's how this all works, is it not?"
"Oh, cheer up."
"All I mean to say is that if you want to stare, stare."
"It's a lot of fun to be the centre of attention."
"ou should try to get comfortable with it some time."
"After all, with each passing day, more and more eyes fall onto you."
"Two nobodies in fine robes from a fallen order... reforming a city and reshaping a battleground."
"You'd be surprised if you knew how many strangers love you."
"As well as how many of them want to kill you."

lines.Vitus: "...Why is this the first I'm hearing of this?"

lines.Zermes: "Because I make sure you never have to think about it."
"I'll leave that up to your imagination"
"You're welcome!"

lines.Vitus: "Why is it that you can bring up such dark topics as if you don't have a care in the world?"

lines.Zermes: "Because nothing does matter, kitten.",
"Are you telling me that you really think there's some greater meaning to everything you do?
"You know what your gods are like."
"You've seen them."
"They're just like us on a grander scale."
"They squabble for what they want, and when they have the power to take it, they do."
"If you take what you want, you can live how you want."
"And then your time runs out and you die."

lines.Vitus: "Somehow you managed to avoid that part."

lines.Zermes: "No, I definitely died."
"Now there was a spectacle."
"I just didn't cease to be."
"Or go wherever you go after, if there is such a thing. "

lines.Vitus: "So you're just going to skulk around forever, then—taking and doing whatever you want?"

lines.Zermes: "That's the plan!"

lines.Vitus: "At least you're honest about that, I suppose. "

lines.Zermes: "Well, now that I think about it, even that wasn't entirely true."
"I don't take anything without asking."
"Kisses, for one."
"Your virginity, for two."

lines.Vitus: "I don't have that to offer you."

lines.Zermes: "I KNEW it!"
"Oh, that's quite alright!"
"Trust me, I'm more than satisfied. "

lines.Vitus: "I hope they choked you nice and slow the first time they offed you."

lines.Zermes: "That would have been much more fun."
